openblocks.yacodeblocks
Class PhoneSynchronizer

java.lang.Object
  openblocks.yacodeblocks.PhoneSynchronizer

public class PhoneSynchronizer
extends Object

Synchronizes communication with the phone. Tasks can be executed immediately or be waited on. The entire queue can also be cancelled at any point.

Author:
kerr@google.com (Debby Wallach)

Constructor Detail

PhoneSynchronizer

public PhoneSynchronizer()
Method Detail

sendNow

public <T> T sendNow(Callable<? extends T> aCallable)
          throws PhoneCommunicationException
Communicate with the phone synchronously. Queues up a callable representing the communication and waits until it is executed. If the execution fails for any of a variety of reasons, signals PhoneCommunicationException, otherwise returns the result of the callable.

Parameters:
aCallable - the callable to execute
Returns:
the result of executing aCallable
Throws:
PhoneCommunicationException

sendNow

public void sendNow(Runnable aRunnable)
             throws PhoneCommunicationException
Communicate with the phone synchronously. Queues up a runnable representing the communication and waits until it is executed. If the execution fails for any of a variety of reasons, signals PhoneCommunicationException, otherwise returns when the runnable is finished.

Parameters:
aRunnable - the runnable to execute
Throws:
PhoneCommunicationException

sendEventually

public void sendEventually(Runnable aRunnable)
                    throws PhoneCommunicationException
Communicate with the phone asynchronously. Queues up a runnable representing the communication and returns immediately. If the queueing process fails, signals PhoneCommunicationException.

Parameters:
aRunnable - the runnable to queue up
Throws:
PhoneCommunicationException

cancelAllAndWait

public void cancelAllAndWait()
                      throws PhoneCommunicationException
Makes a best-effort attempt to cancel the current task and all outstanding ones. If we can't cancel any of the tasks, we don't cancel them.

Throws:
PhoneCommunicationException
